title: Corporal Cameron of the North West mounted police;
author: Connor, Ralph
snippet: It was Martin, his little quarter-back, that finally put him on the right track. He had heard Cameron's pipes not more than an hour ago at his lodgings in Morningside Road.

title: Letters and memorials of Jane Welsh Carlyle.
author: Carlyle, Jane Welsh
snippet: But there is plenty of east wind to keep one from suffocating, provided one can get it without the dust. I used to fancy Piccadilly dusty; but, oh, my, if you saw the Morningside Road !
